attributes.action: Help the residents of Regent court cheltenham, have a safe garden for children.
attributes.background: I have a 3 year old and a 3 month old, I have been trying to move for the last year or so, as I do not have a safe area for my children to play and there are a few young children in this block of flats. The council will not help us have a safe fenced garden for our children to play.

rejection.details:
We are sorry that we have to reject this petition but it would be a matter for your local council. Local councils often have their own e-petition sites.

Or you could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Or you could write a petition asking for the government to pass a law ensuring that all councils had a responsibility to provide safe fenced playing areas for children.
